original_text:
When a trumpet sounds in a city,
    do not the people tremble?
When disaster comes to a city,
    has not the Lord caused it?
korean_text: 성읍에서 나팔이 울리는데 백성이 어찌 두려워하지 아니하겠으며 여호와의 행하심이 없는데 재앙이 어찌 성읍에 임하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: When a trumpet sounds in a city
When disaster comes to a city
has not the Lord caused it?
